Name: Void Monsters 2: The Blight
About the game: Play Void Monsters 1: Spring City Tales NOW! / A completely new adventure set in a new part of the Void Monsters universe. As a simple goat herder, it has never been your dream, nor destiny, to look beyond your own farm. But when tragedy leaves the fate of the world on your shoulders, will you crumble under it's weight, or will you step up, and forge a name for yourself amongst the greatest monster trainers of all time! Features: A huge open world to explore. Over 100 unique monsters to collect, train, and evolve. A dynamic economy influenced by your choices. Break into, and steal from, any house, shop, or warehouse. A massive crafting system with hundreds of craftable items. Hundreds of quests including an immense main storyline. Multiple ways to proceed and complete the game. 40 hours of scripted gameplay. A battle arena to challenge other monster trainers. Breed goats on your farm for milk, to craft battle cheeses and magical yogurts. An advanced weapon and armour socketing system.
